title: Font Optima BQ
content:
Hello,   
I am searching for a font named Optima BQ in its original form. At AGFA Monotype oder ITC I found various fonts like Optima LT, Optima Medium etc. but not a font BQ.   
Can everybody help me where I can get it.   
Thanks.   
Greatings Mickey
author: mickey01

comments.content:
It has been available through [Berthold](http://web.archive.org/web/20101212230927/http:/www.bertholdtypes.com/home.html) (BQ stands for   
Berthold Quality, the "brand name" under which Berthold   
released their own digitized versions of their fonts in   
the mid-nineties) but though the collection [still exists](http://web.archive.org/web/20101212230927/http:/www.bertholdtypes.com/bq_library/BQ_library.html)  
Optima BQ isn't included not anymore.
Well there's not much _WE_ can do about it, can we Fredrik? ![:-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20101212230927im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif)

Nonono Fredrik no apologies don't misunderstand me!   
I never doubted that this was a case of cross-posting.   
I was referring to your "Now, that wasn't much help",   
as if we decided to stop carrying Optima BQ in the   
Berthold Collection. That "WE" was certainly not to   
stress that "I got it first" or something stupid like that. ![:-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20101212230927im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif)
